document.heading: AN ORDINANCE ADDING A CHAPTER 4.97 TO TITLE 4 OF THE SAN MATEO COUNTY ORDINANCE CODE PROHIBITING SMOKING IN AND AROUND MULTI-UNIT RESIDENCES, AND AMENDING CHAPTER 4.96 TO DELETE REFERENCES TO MULTI-UNIT RESIDENCES
